How to invite a user to CatVision.io

When you need a colleague or friend to join you at CatVision.io, there is a simple way how to do that. Let us show you how to do it, with pictures!

  1. Locate product menu
  2. Choose Users
  3. Locate button Invite user
  4. Type down email address **of your colleague or friend and **hit Invite

  5. Now, you can see if your invitee has accepted your invitation or not, and also you can edit his access rights

  6. Read-only means, the invited user can only use CatVision.io services, but can not do any changes, e.g. deauthorise devices or see your Billing options, and Admin level access gives user full power over the product.
